title: Harper's Tale
description: Eat, Sleep, Game… Repeat.Grieving the losses from the fight with an evil sorcerer, pro gamer and fox-shifter Harper retreats from Wylde to the human world of gaming competitions and conventions. But evil isn’t just a supernatural problem, and when bad guys mess with Harper’s con-going friends, they are about to learn the hard way that she only knows how to do two things: Kick ass, and take screenshots.(Events in this novel take place between Magic to the Bone and Dungeon Crawl)
author: Annie Bellet
